price: Zakariyyā berkata, "Ya Tuhan-ku, bagaimana aku bisa mendapat anak sedang aku telah sangat tua dan istriku pun seorang yang mandul?" Berfirman Allah, "Demikianlah, Allah berbuat apa yang dikehendaki-Nya".
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَقَدۡ بَلَغَنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ وَٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٞۖ قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱللَّهُ يَفۡعَلُ مَا يَشَآءُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun waqad balaghaniya al-kibaru wa-im'ra-atī ʿāqirun qāla kadhālika al-lahu yafʿalu mā yashāu
